content:
pdf of pattern was available from knit and crochet today website prior to its renaming but is there no longer **from the coats & clark website ** fun to crochet this beautiful afghan is created in panels of tunisian crochet and embellished with cross stitch **skill level ** experienced **supplies **
* red heart® super saver® article e300 7 oz/364 yds 5 skeins no 316 soft white ca 4 skeins no 385 royal cb 1 skein each no 381 lt blue cc no 885 delft blue cd no 631 lt sage ce 1 ounce #329 cornmeal
